text.p: True or false: If [mathjaxinline]A[/mathjaxinline] is an [mathjaxinline]m\times n[/mathjaxinline] matrix and [mathjaxinline]B[/mathjaxinline] is an [mathjaxinline]n\times p[/mathjaxinline] matrix, and the columns of [mathjaxinline]B[/mathjaxinline] are linearly independent, then the columns of [mathjaxinline]AB[/mathjaxinline] must be linearly independent.

font.p: Here is a counterexample: If [mathjaxinline]A[/mathjaxinline] is the zero matrix, then [mathjaxinline]AB[/mathjaxinline] is also the zero matrix, and thus the columns of [mathjaxinline]AB[/mathjaxinline] are linearly dependent.
